vote.title: To Recognize and Celebrate the Grand Opening of G’s Shephard Springs Cafe
vote.description:
Title
To Recognize and Celebrate the Grand Opening of G’s Shephard Springs Cafe
 
Body
WHEREAS, located at 900 Sunbury Road Columbus, Ohio 43219, in the Shepard Subdivision and Saint Mary’s of the Springs Subdivisions, G's Shepard Springs Cafe provides more than a great coffee experience; and 
 
WHEREAS, the name Shepard Springs Café is a nod to local history, combining both the Shepard neighborhood and St. Mary of the Springs College, which became the nearby Ohio Dominican University; and 
 
WHEREAS, Ray A. Jones and Gladys Maricel Alvarez Morales created a café that serves more than food to the community, the café spurs additional development; and
 
WHEREAS, with a menu selection of healthy fresh foods, brewed coffee using the highest quality beans to create custom coffee blends having their own unique taste of expressos, cappuccinos, mochas along with various types of teas. In addition, the café will offer private meeting rooms to accommodate customers wanting to hold private meetings; and 
 
WHEREAS, the impact will spur revitalization in an area that had lost much of its commercial and retail service during the construction period of the Interstate 670 Highway system, built in the 1970’s; and
 
WHEREAS, G’s Shepard Springs Café will create jobs, increase tax revenues, spur economic development, create a bilingual atmosphere (English & Spanish) and provide healthy meals in an area considered a food desert along with occasional entertainment; now, therefore 
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council does hereby recognize and celebrate the grand opening of G’s Shephard Springs Cafe.
